original_text: And when he was come into the temple, the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching, and said, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority?
korean_text: 예수께서 성전에 들어가 가르치실새 대제사장들과 백성의 장로들이 나아와 이르되 네가 무슨 권위로 이런 일을 하느냐 또 누가 이 권위를 주었느냐

sentences.original_text: And when he was come into the temple
the chief priests and the elders of the people
came unto him as he was teaching
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가르치고 있을 때 그에게 나아와

sentences.original_text: By what authority doest thou these things?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 이런 일들을 하는 권세가 무엇이냐?

sentences.original_text: and who gave thee this authority?
